articles.title: Solid tumors use a type of T cell as a shield against immune attack - Science Daily
articles.description: Scientists have identified a subset of T cells that show up in great numbers in head and neck tumors, but not in similar tissues of the mouth inflamed by common ailments such as gum disease.
articles.content: An unexpected trick in cancer's playbook may fool an important component of our immune systems into knocking down our natural defenses against solid tumors.Scientists at Fred Hutchinson Cancer Center… [+7458 chars]

articles.author: Paolo DeAndreis
articles.title: Following the MedDiet Improves Depression Symptoms in Young Men - Olive Oil Times
articles.description: Researchers said the results demonstrate the role of a healthy diet in the treatment of depression in young adults.
articles.content:
Adopting the Mediterranean diet can sig­nif­i­cantly con­tribute to improv­ing symp­toms of depres­sion in young men.
This is the most sig­nif­i­cant con­clu­sion of a ran­dom­ized con­trol trial co… [+4765 chars]
